title: WeWork, China, and Silicon Valley activism: this year in tech
description:
Reset’s end-of-year tech episode, featuring Adrianne Jeffries from The Markup, and executive editor of The Verge, TC Sottek.

Featuring
@SeriousStoic
@adrjeffries

Links to resources discussed:
Underunderstood podcast
TC Sottek at The Verge

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
